mapper.select: select * from mb_prod_define where PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COLUMN_STATUS !='W' order by SEQ_NO + 0
select * from mb_prod_define where PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COLUMN_STATUS !='Y' order by SEQ_NO + 0
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_prod_define
PROD_TYPE,
SEQ_NO,
ASSEMBLE_TYPE,
ASSEMBLE_ID,
EVENT_DEFAULT,
ATTR_KEY,
ATTR_VALUE,
STATUS,
COMPANY,
#{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assembleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assembleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{eventDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select
EVENT_TYPE pk_value, EVENT_TYPE || ' ' || EVENT_DESC pk_desc
EVENT_TYPE pk_value,concat(EVENT_TYPE,' ',EVENT_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_prod_define a,mb_event_type b WHERE a.ASSEMBLE_ID = b.EVENT_TYPE
AND PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
